summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activity of Jeffrey Epstein for the month of October 2015. It includes information on deposits, outgoing transfers, and the account balance at the end of the month, highlighting significant transactions and the flow of funds.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary individual associated with the account detailed in this financial statement, showing his financial activities during October 2015.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact person for inquiries regarding the account statement.

persons.name: Martin O. Weinberg
persons.context: Martin O. Weinberg is referenced as an attorney associated with a transaction from Epstein's account.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is a contact person for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank.
Martin O. Weinberg is mentioned in connection with a transaction related to Jeffrey Epstein's account.

events.title: Account Statement Period
events.description: The account statement covers the financial activities of Jeffrey Epstein's account for the month of October 2015.

events.title: Incoming Transfer
events.description: An incoming transfer of $2,000,000.00 was recorded from Jeepers Inc. to Jeffrey Epstein's account.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer
events.description: An outgoing transfer of $3,000,000.00 was made from Jeffrey Epstein's account to Alostar Bank of Commerce.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, Saint Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account balance for Jeffrey Epstein as of October 31, 2015, was $1,335,900.16.
Significant outgoing transfers included $3,000,000.00 to Alostar Bank of Commerce and $2,000,000.00 to Jeepers Inc.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for inquiries regarding the account.
Martin O. Weinberg is mentioned in relation to a transaction from Epstein's account.
No service charges or overdraft fees were recorded for the statement period.
